item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Why are you re-creating this, you are just making more work for yourself, considering you’d need to add EVERY weapon if you’re using item ids.

Also why are you using p.stream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian()? Isn’t the item listing server sided?

public int getWeaponAnimation(String weaponName) {

if (weaponName.contains("whip"))
return 1658;

//or

switch (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]) {

}

}

case 130:
n.appendHit(1,0);
break;
}
NPC n = new NPC();
and in NPC.java i added public NPC(){}
Any ideas how to fix that/add this in another way?
